title: Boot Win7 with VHD by PXE?

forumNotes.author: motote
forumNotes.content:
Hi everyone,  
I'm looking for a way to boot win7 using a network vhd...   
My initial idea was to boot without even HD, but this option requires huge amount of RAM and wait a lot of time to transfer the image each time.  

My second idea is to boot a winPE image by network, this PE should have an script that check if the server have a new image version, if so, then copy locally to the HD and then boot with that local VHD  

Is this possible??... Can I boot a VHD from withini a PE enviroment??  

Any other idea??  

Thanks!
